answers.answer: Congrats!!!! That is so exciting... Not too much longer left!! Why are you having him 4 weeks early? Thank you and good luck I will be thinking about you at 12:30!!!!!!!!!!
Because I have health problems and because my last csection was a "T" incision.
If you don't mind me asking what kind of health problems? I just got diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes. So I'm curious. How is the baby doing? You had him already right? How was the c section?

I had a section 13 days ago due to a very high risk pregnancy was only 32 weeks but everything went fine an baby doin very well in hospital was also very nervous but in the end everything will work hope everything goes as good for you during and after your section with you an baby <3
Good luck to both you and your beautiful son. My prayers are with you both:)

question: My csection is scheduled for today at 12:30. I am,nervous, excited. It seems like the time will never come. I want to hold my son in my arms. Wish me luck and please pray for my son. He will be 4 weeks early.
title: csection today at 36 weeks
